---
title: "Instrumental Variables"
---

::: {.cell hash='09_iv_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_8810b3916d5ffa5df40bdb87321153f1'}

```{.r .cell-code}
newFeature <-readRDS("C:/Users/ahmed/OneDrive/Dokumente/Causal_Data_Science_Data/rand_enc.rds")
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='09_iv_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_f3dcc23724101a4634b5af4d17efc956'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library("dagitty")
library("ggdag")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
#> 
#> Attaching package: 'ggdag'
```
:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
#> The following object is masked from 'package:stats':
#> 
#>     filter
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
library("ggplot2")


# Instrumental Variable Estimation - Application
iv_expl <- dagify(
  Y ~ D,
  Y ~ U,
  D ~ U,
  D ~ Z,
  exposure = "D",
  latent = "U",
  outcome = "Y",
  coords = list(x = c(U = 1, D = 0, Y = 2, Z = -1),
                y = c(U = 1, D = 0, Y = 0, Z = 0)),
  labels = c("D" = "Used_ftr", 
             "Y" = "time_spent", 
             "U" = "Willingness",
             "Z" = "Rand_Enc")
)
ggdag(iv_expl, text = T) +
  guides(color = "none") +
  geom_dag_text(color = "white") +
  geom_dag_edges(edge_color = "white") +
  geom_dag_label_repel(aes(label = label))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](09_iv_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='09_iv_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_e37c70cf3ef5871ae4d315b68cd0d260'}

```{.r .cell-code}
model_naive_biased <- lm(time_spent ~ used_ftr, data = newFeature)

summary(model_naive_biased)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
#> 
#> Call:
#> lm(formula = time_spent ~ used_ftr, data = newFeature)
#> 
#> Residuals:
#>      Min       1Q   Median       3Q      Max 
#> -20.4950  -3.5393   0.0158   3.5961  20.5051 
#> 
#> Coefficients:
#>             Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
#> (Intercept) 18.86993    0.06955   271.3   <2e-16 ***
#> used_ftr    10.82269    0.10888    99.4   <2e-16 ***
#> ---
#> Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1
#> 
#> Residual standard error: 5.351 on 9998 degrees of freedom
#> Multiple R-squared:  0.497,	Adjusted R-squared:  0.497 
#> F-statistic:  9881 on 1 and 9998 DF,  p-value: < 2.2e-16
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='09_iv_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_4b2baecf7f190004367fcb41d3ca52cd'}

```{.r .cell-code}
cor(newFeature) %>% round(2)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
#>            rand_enc used_ftr time_spent
#> rand_enc       1.00     0.20       0.13
#> used_ftr       0.20     1.00       0.71
#> time_spent     0.13     0.71       1.00
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
cat(" There is a positive correaltion between rand_enc and used_ftr and used_ftr has a big influence on time_spent so our IV is very importnat in this application.")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
#>  There is a positive correaltion between rand_enc and used_ftr and used_ftr has a big influence on time_spent so our IV is very importnat in this application.
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='09_iv_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_fc8a76d4c1030acd6274fcca0651be32'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library("estimatr")
model_iv <- iv_robust(time_spent ~ used_ftr | rand_enc, data = newFeature)
summary(model_iv)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
#> 
#> Call:
#> iv_robust(formula = time_spent ~ used_ftr | rand_enc, data = newFeature)
#> 
#> Standard error type:  HC2 
#> 
#> Coefficients:
#>             Estimate Std. Error t value  Pr(>|t|) CI Lower CI Upper   DF
#> (Intercept)   19.312     0.2248   85.89 0.000e+00   18.872    19.75 9998
#> used_ftr       9.738     0.5353   18.19 8.716e-73    8.689    10.79 9998
#> 
#> Multiple R-squared:  0.4921 ,	Adjusted R-squared:  0.492 
#> F-statistic:   331 on 1 and 9998 DF,  p-value: < 2.2e-16
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
cat("The estimate is biased and it is upward biased")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
#> The estimate is biased and it is upward biased
```
:::
